alert.note: Alert for Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:32PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Wood County through 415 PM EDT... At 331 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deshler, or 13 miles southwest of Bowling Green, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Weston, Pemberville, Luckey, Bradner, Wayne, Risingsun, Cygnet, Portage, Jerry City, Hoytville, Custar, West Millgrove and Milton Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northwestern Ohio.
